TopicTitle: Anybody want a mars rover mod?

Articles.Content:
yes i am tempted to make a mars rovers mod with perseverance...

But i have never done  any kind of modding before i have read the KSP wikis mod making page 

Sooo any tips to learn how to mod ksp?

 

 

note :this may be released but dont get your hopes up.
